rule.message: Edl Error: doLogging = "true" but no logFile is given!
Edl Error: Environment- output image data is defined as IMAGE, but file extension is not ".ima"!
Edl Error: Environment- output image data is defined as DICOM, but file extension is not ".dcm"!
Edl Error: Environment- output image data is defined as ANALYZE, but file extension is not ".img"!
Edl Error: Number of measurments (MR_TAG_MEASUREMENTS) does not fit to number of scans in GW design! Missed ignored scans?
Edl Error: Check size of scanBasedRegressor and size of sbrDesign in gwDesignStruct! Missed ignored scans?
Edl Error: Check size of timeBasedRegressor Nr.1 and size of tbrDesign in gwDesignStruct! Missed repetitions?
Edl Error: Check size of timeBasedRegressor Nr.1 and size of tbrDesign in swDesignStruct! Missed repetitions?
Edl Error: Check size of timeBasedRegressor Nr.2 and size of tbrDesign in gwDesignStruct! Missed repetitions?
Edl Error: Check size of timeBasedRegressor Nr.2 and size of tbrDesign in swDesignStruct! Missed repetitions?
Edl Error: Check length of timeBasedRegressor and number of scans in measurement! Missed ignored scans?
Edl Error: Check length of timeBasedRegressor and number of scans in measurement! Missed ignored scans? Measurement must be at least as long as needed time in design!
Edl Error: Number of measurments (MR_TAG_MEASUREMENTS) does not fit to number of scans in Sliding Window design! Missed ignored scans?
Edl Error: Check size of scanBasedRegressor and size of sbrDesign in Sliding Window DesignStruct! Missed ignored scans?
Edl Error: Input image data is defined as IMAGE, but file extension is not ".ima"!
Edl Error: Input image data is defined as DICOM, but file extension is not ".dcm"!
Edl Error: Input image data is defined as ANALYZE, but file extension is not ".img"!
Edl Error: TR defined in image modalities does not match TR defined in MRI parameters !
Edl Error: Input image data mosaic: the imgWidth must be equal or bigger than tileWidth!
Edl Error: Input image data mosaic: the imgHeight must be equal or bigger than tileHeight!
Edl Error: MR-Params TE (MR_TAG_TE) is not lower than TR (MR_TAG_TR).
Edl Error: MR-Params: Phase Resolution (MR_TAG_PHASE_RESOLUTION) is 100%, but Matrix (MR_TAG_BASE_RESOLUTION) does not fit the dimensions of image data in experimentData.imageModalities !.
Edl Error: MR-Params: Phase Resolution (MR_TAG_PHASE_RESOLUTION) is 100%, but Matrix (MR_TAG_BASE_RESOLUTION) does not fit the dimensions of image data in experimentData.imageModalities !.
Edl Error: MR-Params: The given slices in imageModalities do not match the number of slices defined in MR-Params!.
Edl Error: MR-Params: The given slices in imageModalities do not match the number of slices defined in MR-Params!
Edl Error: Statistic-Params: Double gamma reference function number 1: The time to peak for overshoot (tPeak1) must be lower that time to peak for undershoot (tPeak2)!
Edl Error: Statistic-Params: Double gamma reference function number 2: The time to peak for overshoot (tPeak1) must be lower that time to peak for undershoot (tPeak2)!
Edl Error: Statistic-Params: Double gamma reference function number 3: The time to peak for overshoot (tPeak1) must be lower that time to peak for undershoot (tPeak2)!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The measurement defined in MR-Params does not (at least) last as long as stimulus presentation!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The measurement defined in MR-Params does not (at least) last as long as stimulus presentation!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The regressor(s) defined in sliding window design does not (at least) last as long as stimulus presentation!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in sliding window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in sliding window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in sliding window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The regressor(s) defined in sliding window design does not (at least) last as long as stimulus presentation!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in sliding window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in sliding window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in sliding window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
Edl Error: Stimulus-Params: The stimulus presentation does not (at least) last as long as regressor(s) defined in growing window design!
